law.catch_line: Notice and action on amendment of organic rules.

text.section:
Except as provided in KRS 272A.4-010(1) and 272A.4-050(6), the organic rules of a limited cooperative association may be amended only at a members meeting. An amendment may be proposed by either:
A majority of the board of directors, or a greater percentage if required by the organic rules; or
One (1) or more petitions signed by at least ten percent (10%) of the patron members or at least ten percent (10%) of the investor members.

law.history: Created 2012 Ky. Acts ch. 160, sec. 24, effective July 12, 2012.
